thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Early Capital-Bonds Recall Cuts Risk of Run on Two Indian Banks

author: Manju Dalal
title: Early Capital-Bonds Recall Cuts Risk of Run on Two Indian Banks

organizations.name: bank of maharashtra and oriental bank of commerce

text:
Two state-owned Indian banks are making early repurchases of securities designed to absorb losses, in the latest sign of the growing stress within the country’s banking sector.
Bank of Maharashtra and Oriental Bank of Commerce plan to buy back so-called “additional tier 1” securities worth a combined total of 45 billion Indian rupees ($690 million) later this month—two years before they are due to mature.
Banks...
